# Problem Statement

In this notebook we will explore how to do Automatic Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) on the Tabular Playground Series January 2022 dataset using [LUX](https://github.com/lux-org/lux).

We are going to cover the following steps:
1. Install LUX
2. Import Libraries
3. Load Dataset
4. Print Report
5. References

Let's get started.
